title: How to Download Showbox on Android

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. . It's the app that generally has an icon that resembles a gear. Tap the icon on your home screen or apps menu to open the Settings app. Before you can download and install apps that aren't in the Google Play Store, Galaxy Store, Amazon App Store, etc, you need to allow your web browser to download unknown apps.

steps.title: Tap Apps/Applications.
steps.content: Tap Apps/Applications . It's in the Settings menu. This is the displays a list of all your apps on your Android device.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . It's the button with three dots in the upper-right corner. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Special Access.
steps.content: Tap Special Access . It's in the menu that appears when you tap the icon with three dots in the upper-right corner of the Apps menu.

steps.title: Tap Install unknown apps.
steps.content: Tap Install unknown apps . It's near the bottom of the Special Access menu. This displays a list of apps on your Android device.

steps.title: Tap your preferred web browser.
steps.content: Tap your preferred web browser. This can be whichever web browser you use to browse the internet. It can be Google Chrome, Firefox, or the default Android or Galaxy web browser that came with your device.

steps.title: Tap the toggle switch next to "Allow from this source."
steps.content: Tap the toggle switch next to "Allow from this source." This allows your web browser to download and install unknown apps.

steps.title: Go to https://www.bollyzoom.com/showbox-apk-free-download/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.bollyzoom.com/showbox-apk-free-download/ in a web browser. You can use any browser on your Android, including Chrome, Firefox, or the Samsung Internet app. Only download Showbox from this site. Downloading Showbox from another site puts your device at risk for viruses or malware!

steps.title: Tap Download Showbox.
steps.content: Tap Download Showbox . This displays the information page for Showbox.

steps.title: Tap Download .APK file.
steps.content: Tap Download .APK file . It's the black button in the center of the page. This downloads the install file. If you see a warning asking if you are sure you want to download this file, tap OK .

steps.title: Tap the downloaded file.
steps.content: Tap the downloaded file. If you don’t see a link to the file on the screen, swipe down from the top of the screen—it should show up there. A warning message will appear once you tap the file.

steps.title: Tap Install.
steps.content: Tap Install . If your Android is not already set up to allow app installs from unknown sources, you’ll be prompted to allow your browser to install apps.

steps.title: Tap Open.
steps.content: Tap Open . This opens Showbox once it is installed.
